title: What Kevin Durant said about Jayson Tatum’s Achilles recovery, chances of returning this year
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Kevin Durant praises Jayson Tatum's rapid rehab, noting Tatum's ability to dunk six months post-Achilles surgery.
Tatum is considering a 2025-26 season return, ahead of expected recovery timelines, following Achilles surgery.
Durant, having experienced similar injury, believes Tatum's return this season is possible but should be cautious.

title: Amid tragedy, childhood friends DeMario Douglas and Terrell Jennings persevere in Patriots’ win
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: DeMario Douglas and Terrell Jennings led the Patriots to a 24-23 win over the Falcons while coping with personal losses.
Douglas achieved his first 100-yard receiving game, scoring a touchdown, days after his uncle was tragically killed.
Jennings, signed off the practice squad, scored his first NFL touchdown in the game, overcoming a background of hardship.

title: Mike Vrabel shares message to Patriots, Drake Maye after nail-biting win over Falcons
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots coach Mike Vrabel stresses the importance of joy after a narrow 24-23 victory over the Atlanta Falcons.
Quarterback Drake Maye acknowledges his mistakes, highlights the need for improvement despite scoring 259 yards and two touchdowns.
Atlanta's missed extra point proved crucial as New England's defense struggled with pressure and turnovers during the game.

title: Former Newton Mayor Setti Warren dies ‘unexpectedly’ at 55
author: Audrey Cooney
bullets: Former Newton Mayor Setti Warren died unexpectedly at his Newton home on Sunday at the age of 55.
Setti Warren was the first African American mayor in Massachusetts, serving in Newton from 2009 to 2018.
Warren was a lecturer at Harvard Kennedy School and leaves behind his wife, Tassy, and two children.

title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled against Falcons
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: DeMario Douglas achieved his first 100-yard game, significantly contributing to the Patriots' win with a standout 58-yard catch.
Drake Maye's performance included two turnovers that allowed the Falcons to remain competitive, despite his overall productivity.
The Patriots' offensive line struggled, allowing six sacks, impacting both their running and passing games against the Falcons.

title: Boston residents say they feel safer downtown compared to last year in new survey
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: A survey by the Downtown Boston Neighborhood Association found a decline in residents feeling 'less safe' since last year.
92% of respondents still view public safety as an urgent issue despite improved feelings of safety downtown.
Retail vacancies have decreased, attributed to increased safety, though retail theft and business access issues persist.

title: 10 takeaways from Patriots’ 24-23 win over the Falcons
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots secure a narrow 24-23 win over the Falcons, extending their win streak to six games.
Drake Maye threw for 259 yards and two touchdowns despite committing two turnovers leading to Falcons' points.
Former Patriots kicker Parker Romo missed an extra point, preventing a tie and potential overtime.

title: 10 defendants, including a grandma, indicted in statewide sex trafficking case
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Ten people indicted for a statewide sex trafficking case in Massachusetts involving multiple counties from March 2023 to September 2025.
Gianni Martinez, 23, and Rosa Garcia, 68, both of Lynn, allegedly trafficked women, with Martinez facing multiple charges including trafficking and rape.
Five alleged buyers, including Andrew Parvey and John Vincent, were indicted after text messages from seized cell phones revealed commercial sex activities.

title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Miles Teller hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Miles Teller hosted 'SNL' on Nov. 2, marking his second hosting appearance, with Brandi Carlile as musical guest.
The episode featured a political cold open with Teller participating in a mock New York City mayoral debate.
Brandi Carlile made her fourth appearance as 'SNL' musical guest, previously performing with Elton John in Season 50.

title: Regulators are limiting a proposed Eversource rate hike in Mass.
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: The Massachusetts Department of Public Utilities rejected $45 million from Eversource's proposed rate hike, reducing potential costs for customers.
Eversource sought a 13%-17% rate increase affecting 300,000 customers, potentially raising bills by $41 monthly this winter.
Governor Maura Healey criticized the proposed increases, stating they were unaffordable, supporting the regulatory decision to limit them.
